name: Pocket Book: Mein Geheimes Tagebuch
overview: Indispensable: the first personal and super secret day, note, and friendship book! With password protection - no one else will ever be able to read your entries without your permission! Your friend book: From favorite food to favorite music to secret crush - here you can find out everything about your dearest friends. Profiles and contacts can be exchanged (wireless multi-card game) With an organizer for the birthdays of your friends and family and all your appointments. Equipped with a reminder function! With a funny ICH configurator (2D), many hairstyles, hair colors, face shapes, accessories, etc. Chat with your friends!
